availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Scott (Kenton County Deputy Sheriff)

body.p: Kenton County Deputy Sheriff. Kentucky native. Kenton County Deputy Sheriff from c1860 to 1864.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1321. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 133.“John S. Scott,” Find A Grave, March 14, 2012, memorial no. 86756671 (accessed January 20, 2017). Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Deaths, Kenton County, 1884.
